column1: 23116333_17,s0,T1,T2,"To test this hypothesis, the double mutants between ",npr1,"-1 and NahG (a transgenic plant that degrades SA,), eds5 (a mutant in SA transport,), and ",sid2," (a mutant in SA biosynthesis,), were constructed and tested for RIM. npr1-1 did not respond to MeJA even if the levels of SA were low (Figure 3c), so the hypothesis of a reinforcement of the negative crosstalk was not supported.

,Not_a_complex
